lines.text: An exceptional lover is bound to make a bad husband.
Two billion taxes to pay. They call it budget. I call it robbery under arms!
In my case, when it comes to the fair sex, enthusiasm always beats education.
Don't move! Just stay like that!... A Matisse... If you were naked you would be a Renoir. Had you comme a cropper we would now own a Picasso!
Marriage is what differentiates man from the beast.
You must confuse matrimony with laughter... Which is not the same thing though!
I must admit I don't quite get the diffence.
you, me, the one you believe you are, the one you think I am, the one I believe is me, the one you'd like to be, plus all those we could have been.
